featured.text: While it does have its share of resort hotels, shopping centers and good restaurants, and a smattering of museums, art galleries and night spots, its main attractions lie outdoors.

definition.zh_def: 戶外，指在自然環境中，不在建築物內的地方。
definition.en_def: In or into the open air; outside.
definition.example: We love to spend our weekends outdoors, hiking and enjoying nature.
